general.title: General
general.desc_shortcut: The keyboard shortcut that will activate the parser. Defaults to CTRL-Space
general.desc_autostart: When enabled, Starts Lavendeux automatically with the operating system
general.desc_lang: Language to use in the software. Parser errors will be displayed in english
general.lbl_lang_disclaimer: The translations below are crude and automated, feedback is much appreciated

parsing.title: Parsing
parsing.desc_ecm: When enabled, replaces highlighted text directly, bypassing the clipboard. Otherwise, replaces the clipboard's contents
parsing.desc_timeout: The maximum time the parser will run expressions; in milliseconds
parsing.desc_script: A Lavendeux script to run every time the parser starts up

display.title: Display
display.desc_errors: When enabled, parsing errors will appear in the corner of your screen as a small popup. Errors can still be viewed in the log if turned off
display.desc_dark: When enabled, uses a darker, less intrusive theme
